p: Viridiflorol-TyrRS (1JIJ) interactions: It can be suggested from our molecular docking results tabulated in ( Table 6) that viridiflorol exhibiting the highest binding energy (âˆ’7.2 kcal/mol). This compound was nicely bound to TyrRS with van der Waals interactions with Tyr36, Cys37, Gly38, Ala39, Asp40, Gly72, Thr75, Asp80, Asn124, Tyr170, Gln174, Asp177, Gln190, Val191, Glu192, Gln196 and Ile200 residues and Alkyl interactions with only Leu70 (4.71) (5.33).
